Goal: Verify that stored vectors in Qdrant can be retrieved accurately.

Success criteria:
- Query Qdrant and receive correct top-k matches
- Retrieved chunks match original text
- Metadata \(url, chunk_id\) returns correctly
- End-to-end test: input query → Qdrant response → clean JSON output" -Number 3 -ShortName "rag-retrieval-testing")

Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "  Integrate backend RAG Agent with frontend UI

  Goal: Connect the FastAPI Agent to the Docusaurus site so users can ask questions and receive RAG answers.

  Success criteria:
  - Frontend calls backend /ask endpoint successfully
  - Displays answer, sources, and matched text chunks in UI
  - Handles loading states, errors, and empty responses
  - Local development works end-to-end

  Constraints:
  - No redesign of entire UI
  - Keep API requests minimal + clean
  - Only implement connection, not new backend logic" -Json -Number 1 -ShortName "rag-agent-ui-integration" "Integrate backend RAG Agent with frontend UI")
